member.summary: The viewed document.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.Overview.DiagramView
member.summary: Gets or sets the DiagramView instance whose contents to display in the overview control.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.Overview.FitAll
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to fit the whole diagram inside the overview window control.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.Overview.ScaleFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets a fixed scale factor to be used when FitAll is disabled.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.Overview.SmoothingMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the current anti-alias mode.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.Overview.DisplayShadows
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to paint the shadows of items in the overview control.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.Overview.DisplayImages
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to paint node Images in the overview control.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.Overview.DisplayInterior
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to fill interior of nodes with their FillColor.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.Overview.DisplayBackground
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to paint the diagram background with the diagram’s BackBrush.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.Overview.DisplayBackgroundImage
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to paint diagram's BackgroundImage in the overview control.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.Overview.DisplayText
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to paint the text of items in the overview control.

member.summary: Gets or sets the background color of the overview control.

member.summary: Shows or hides the scrollbars of the overview control.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.Overview.DimColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a color used to blend with the part of the diagram that is not visible in the DiagramView‘s client rectangle.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.WinForms.Overview.Viewport
member.summary: Gets or sets the viewport rectangle.
